file.name: openapi.yaml
file.content: openapi: 3.0.1 servers: - url: https://api.nfusionsolutions.biz info: contact: email: support@nfusionsolutions.com name: nFusion Solutions url: https://nfusionsolutions.com/contact-us x-twitter: nfusionsolution description: "[nFusion Solutions](https://nfusionsolutions.com) provides [REST APIs](https://nfusionsolutions.com/data-feeds/) that deliver enterprise-grade financial data. Data sets include real-time and historical pricing for Spot prices of precious metals such as Gold, Silver, Platinum, and Palladium, exchange rates for major currency pairs, exchange rates for Crypto Currencies such as BTC, ETH, and LTC. All API access requires authentication. In order to be issued access credentials you must first enter into a service agreement with nFusion Solutions and acquire a commercial license. For information on how to obtain a licence [take a tour of our products](https://nfusionsolutions.com/nfusion-solutions-metals-gold-price-feed-tour/) or email sales@nfusionsolutions.com." license: name: Commercial License url: https://nfusionsolutions.com/nfusion-solutions-metals-gold-price-feed-quote/ title: nFusion Solutions Market Data API v1 version: "1" x-apisguru-categories: - financial x-logo: url: https://twitter.com/nfusionsolution/profile_image?size=original x-origin: - format: openapi url: https://api.nfusionsolutions.biz/swagger/1/swagger.json version: "3.0" x-providerName: nfusionsolutions.biz paths: "/api/v{version}/Currencies/history": get: description: "Historical OHLC data for the specified period and interval size\r \r The combination of the interval parameter and start and end dates can result in results\r being truncated to conform to result size limits. See comments on interval parameter for details on valid interval values." parameters: - description: auth token in: query name: token required: true schema: type: string - description: "comma separated list of currency pairs. For example: USD/CAD,USD/EUR,USD/AUD" in: query name: pairs required: true schema: type: string - description: start date of time period. format is yyyy-mm-dd in: query name: start required: true schema: format: date-time type: string - description: end date of time period. format is yyyy-mm-dd. Default is current date. in: query name: end schema: format: date-time type: string - description: "aggregation interval. Composed of an optional integer value (which defaults to 1 when not specified), \r followed by a type string which must be one of the following values:\r y=year,\r m=month,\r w=week,\r d=day,\r h=hour,\r mi=minute\r \r For example, a yearly interval can be specified as \"y\" and 6 month interval as \"6m\". \r \r If not specified the interval parameter default is 1 Day." in: query name: interval schema: type: string - description: to override content negotiation specify a value of json or xml in: query name: format schema: $ref: "#/components/schemas/ResponseFormat" - description: The requested API version in: path name: version required: true schema: type: string responses: "200": content: application/json: schema: items: $ref: "#/components/schemas/IntervalCollectionResponse" type: array application/xml: schema: items: $ref: "#/components/schemas/IntervalCollectionResponse" type: array description: Success "400": content: application/json: schema: $ref: "#/components/schemas/ProblemDetails" application/xml: schema: $ref: "#/components/schemas/ProblemDetails" description: Bad Request "401": content: application/json: schema: $ref: "#/components/schemas/ProblemDetails" application/xml: schema: $ref: "#/components/schemas/ProblemDetails" description: Unauthorized summary: Get historical prices for requested currency pairs tags: - Currencies "/api/v{version}/Currencies/history/supported": get: description: "Only the currency pairs in the direction noted can be used with the history endpoint.\r For example: USD/CAD is not the same as CAD/USD" parameters: - description: auth token in: query name: token required: true schema: type: string - description: to override content negotiation specify a value of json or xml in: query name: format schema: $ref: "#/components/schemas/ResponseFormat" - description: The requested API version in: path name: version required: true schema: type: string responses: "200": content: application/json: schema: items: type: string type: array application/xml: schema: items: type: string type: array description: Success "400": content: application/json: schema: $ref: "#/components/schemas/ProblemDetails" application/xml: schema: $ref: "#/components/schemas/ProblemDetails" description: Bad Request "401": content: application/json: schema: $ref: "#/components/schemas/ProblemDetails" application/xml: schema: $ref: "#/components/schemas/ProblemDetails" description: Unauthorized summary: Get list of currency pairs supported by the history endpoint tags: - Currencies "/api/v{version}/Currencies/rate": get: description: Current Mid Rate parameters: - description: auth token in: query name: token required: true schema: type: string - description: "comma separated list of currency pairs. For example: USD/CAD,USD/EUR,USD/AUD" in: query name: pairs required: true schema: type: string - description: to override content negotiation specify a value of json or xml in: query name: format schema: $ref: "#/components/schemas/ResponseFormat" - description: The requested API version in: path name: version required: true schema: type: string responses: "200": content: application/json: schema: items: $ref: "#/components/schemas/RateResponse" type: array application/xml: schema: items: $ref: "#/components/schemas/RateResponse" type: array description: Success "400": content: application/json: schema: $ref: "#/components/schemas/ProblemDetails" application/xml: schema: $ref: "#/components/schemas/ProblemDetails" description: Bad Request "401": content: application/json: schema: $ref: "#/components/schemas/ProblemDetails" application/xml: schema: $ref: "#/components/schemas/ProblemDetails" description: Unauthorized summary: Get latest mid rate for requested currency pairs tags: - Currencies "/api/v{version}/Currencies/rate/supported": get: description: "Any of the currencies in this list can be paired with any other currency in this list when supplied to the Rate endpoint.\r For example: USD/CAD,CAD/USD,USD/EUR,EUR/CAD" parameters: - description: auth token in: query name: token required: true schema: type: string - description: to override content negotiation specify a value of json or xml in: query name: format schema: $ref: "#/components/schemas/ResponseFormat" - description: The requested API version in: path name: version required: true schema: type: string responses: "200": content: application/json: schema: items: type: string type: array application/xml: schema: items: type: string type: array description: Success "400": content: application/json: schema: $ref: "#/components/schemas/ProblemDetails" application/xml: schema: $ref: "#/components/schemas/ProblemDetails" description: Bad Request "401": content: application/json: schema: $ref: "#/components/schemas/ProblemDetails" application/xml: schema: $ref: "#/components/schemas/ProblemDetails" description: Unauthorized summary: Get list of currencies supported by the rate endpoint tags: - description: "comma separated list of currency pairs. For example: USD/CAD,USD/EUR,USD/AUD" in: query name: pairs required: true schema: type: string - description: to override content negotiation specify a value of json or xml in: query name: format schema: $ref: "#/components/schemas/ResponseFormat" - description: The requested API version in: path name: version required: true schema: type: string responses: "200": content: application/json: schema: items: $ref: "#/components/schemas/SummaryResponse" type: array application/xml: schema: items: $ref: "#/components/schemas/SummaryResponse" type: array description: Success "400": content: application/json: schema: $ref: "#/components/schemas/ProblemDetails" application/xml: schema: $ref: "#/components/schemas/ProblemDetails" description: Bad Request "401": content: application/json: schema: $ref: "#/components/schemas/ProblemDetails" application/xml: schema: $ref: "#/components/schemas/ProblemDetails" description: Unauthorized summary: Get latest Summary for requested currency pairs tags: - description: auth token in: query name: token required: true schema: type: string - description: to override content negotiation specify a value of json or xml in: query name: format schema: $ref: "#/components/schemas/ResponseFormat" - description: The requested API version in: path name: version required: true schema: type: string responses: "200": content: application/json: schema: items: type: string type: array application/xml: schema: items: type: string type: array description: Success "400": content: application/json: schema: $ref: "#/components/schemas/ProblemDetails" application/xml: schema: $ref: "#/components/schemas/ProblemDetails" description: Bad Request "401": content: application/json: schema: $ref: "#/components/schemas/ProblemDetails" application/xml: schema: $ref: "#/components/schemas/ProblemDetails" description: Unauthorized summary: Get list of currency pairs supported by the Summary endpoint tags: - Currencies "/api/v{version}/Metals/benchmark/history": get: description: "Historical OHLC data for the specified period and interval size\r \r The combination of the interval parameter and start and end dates can result in results\r being truncated to conform to result size limits. See comments on interval parameter for details on valid interval values.\r \r The historicalfx flag is used to determine whether to apply today's fx rates to a historical period, or to apply the historical rates from that same time frame." parameters: - description: auth token in: query name: token required: true schema: type: string - description: comma separated list of metals in: query name: metals required: true schema: type: string - description: start date of time period. format is yyyy-mm-dd in: query name: start required: true schema: format: date-time type: string - description: end date of time period. format is yyyy-mm-dd. Default is current date. in: query name: end schema: format: date-time type: string - description: "aggregation interval. Composed of an optional integer value (which defaults to 1 when not specified), \r followed by a type string which must be one of the following values:\r y=year,\r m=month,\r w=week,\r d=day,\r h=hour,\r mi=minute\r \r For example, a yearly interval can be specified as \"y\" and 6 month interval as \"6m\". \r \r If not specified the interval parameter default is 1 Day." in: query name: interval schema: type: string - description: if true use historical currency rates otherwise current currency rates. Defaults to true. in: query name: historicalfx schema: type: boolean - description: comma separated list of conversion currencies, defaults to USD in: query name: currency schema: type: string - description: "unit of meaure, defaults to troy ounces. allowed values are:\r mg=milligram\r g=gram\r kg=kilogram\r gr=grain\r oz=ounce\r toz=troy ounce\r ct=carat\r dwt=pennyweight" in: query name: unitofmeasure schema: $ref: "#/components/schemas/UnitOfMeasure" - description: to override content negotiation specify a value of json or xml in: query name: format schema: $ref: "#/components/schemas/ResponseFormat" - description: The requested API version in: path name: version required: true schema: type: string responses: "200": content: application/json: schema: items: $ref: "#/components/schemas/IntervalCollectionResponse" type: array application/xml: schema: items: $ref: "#/components/schemas/IntervalCollectionResponse" type: array description: Success "400": content: application/json: schema: $ref: "#/components/schemas/ProblemDetails" application/xml: schema: $ref: "#/components/schemas/ProblemDetails" description: Bad Request "401": content: application/json: schema: $ref: "#/components/schemas/ProblemDetails" application/xml: schema: $ref: "#/components/schemas/ProblemDetails" description: Unauthorized summary: Get historical benchmark prices for requested metals tags: - See comments on interval parameter for details on valid interval values.\r \r The historicalfx flag is used to determine whether to apply today's fx rates to a historical period, or to apply the historical rates from that same time frame." parameters: - description: auth token in: query name: token required: true schema: type: string - description: comma separated list of metals in: query name: metals required: true schema: type: string - description: start date of time period. format is yyyy-mm-dd in: query name: start required: true schema: format: date-time type: string - description: end date of time period. format is yyyy-mm-dd. Default is current date. in: query name: end schema: format: date-time type: string - description: "aggregation interval. Composed of an optional integer value (which defaults to 1 when not specified), \r followed by a type string which must be one of the following values:\r y=year,\r m=month,\r w=week,\r d=day,\r h=hour,\r mi=minute\r \r For example, a yearly interval can be specified as \"y\" and 6 month interval as \"6m\". \r \r If not specified the interval parameter default is 1 Day." in: query name: interval schema: type: string - description: if true use historical currency rates otherwise current currency rates.
